content.prompt: Based on predator-prey dynamics, which of the following identifies the hypothesis most likely to be supported by the study?

choices.label: A decrease in the lynx population size will lead to a decrease in the hare population size.
A decrease in the hare population size will lead to an increase in the lynx population size.
An increase in the lynx population size will lead to a decrease in the hare population size.
An increase in the hare population size will lead to a decrease in the lynx population size.

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify a testable hypothesis or scientific question for an investigation.
